definition: to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: Yu Dafu's creative style is very unique in the history of the Chinese literature.
sentences.chinese: 郁达夫的创作风格在中国新文学史上独具特色。

sentences.english: One feature of YU Dafus works is the autobiographic style.
sentences.chinese: 郁达夫作品的突出特色之一，就是自叙传的文体。

sentences.english: The obvious feature of Yu Dafu's works is the emotionally internal tendency.
sentences.chinese: 情感的内化性倾向是郁达夫小说创作的突出特点。

definition: Zhou Zuoren (1885-1967), brother of Lu Xun 魯迅|鲁迅, academic in Japanese and Greek studies, briefly imprisoned after the war as Japanese collaborator, persecuted and died of unknown causes during the Cultural Revolution
Lu Xun (1881-1936), one of the earliest and best-known modern Chinese writers
Hu Shi (1891-1962), original proponent of writing in colloquial Chinese 白話文|白话文[bai2 hua4 wen2]
Xiao Hong (1911-1942), prominent woman writer, originally from Heilongjiang
Guo Moruo (1892-1978), writer, communist party intellectual and cultural apparatchik
Wen Yiduo (1899-1946), poet and patriotic fighter, executed by Guomindang in Kunming
Ba Jin (1904-2005), novelist, author of the trilogy 家, 春, 秋
Cai Yuanpei (1868-1940), liberal educationalist, studied in Germany, president of Peking University 1917-19, minister of education for Guomindang
Lao She (1899-1966), Chinese novelist and dramatist
Zhang Taiyan (1869-1936), scholar, journalist, revolutionary and leading intellectual around the time of the Xinhai revolution
Su Manshu (1884-1918), Chinese writer, journalist, Buddhist monk, participant in the revolutionary movement
